link.title: West Washington County Community Unit School District #10

div.div: If you notice any errors, please contact the webmaster.

b.font: NOTE FROM MRS. ALBERS, THE SCHOOL NURSE

b.span:
If you have a child who will be 5 years old on or before September 1, 2020, and you plan for them to attend
Okawville Grade School, please provide the school with the following information: child’s name, date of birth,
parent names, address and phone number. This information can be emailed to
Melinda Albers, School Nurse at

or left on her voice mail at 618-243-2302.
Required health forms will be mailed once this information is received.

br.span:
1. The Remote Learning Plan for Unit District 10 is attached at the bottom of this page.
Please review it either here or in your TeacherEase email.

font.font:
2. An Educational Resouces tab has been added to both the Okawville Grade School
and the Okawville Jr/Sr High School webpages!

Find links on those tabs for enrichment activities
provided by
district teachers to help guide students while

i.font:
Please take time to read a letter, either from here or in your Teacher Ease email, from Mr. Fuhrhop
updating our present coronavirus status in the district.

font.span: Please find attached below 2 letters from Mr. Fuhrhop regarding

br.span: the coronavirus. Please take time to read them from here or

div.strong:
FOIA Information can be found by viewing the pdf below. To view the information, click on the title.
To download the information, use the down arrow on the right of the page.

strong.span:
Professional Negotiation Agreement for July 1, 2019-June 30, 2022
may be downloaded by using the down arrow on the right side of the page
